pages.text: $(l)Galosphere: Beyond the Ores$() $(br2)Galosphere adds new biomes, mechanics, and resources to enhance your underground adventures. Explore Crystal Canyons and Lichen Caves, and gather unique materials like Allurite shards, Lumiere shards, and Silver Ingots.
$(l)Key Features$() $(br2)- $(l)Crystal Canyons$(): A biome filled with glowing crystals and rare resources. $(br2)- $(l)Lichen Caves$(): Lush caves with unique flora and new mobs.

$(l)New Resources$() $(br2)- $(l)Allurite Shard$(): Used in crafting powerful tools and armor. $(br2)- $(l)Lumiere Shard$(): Emits light and is used in various recipes. $(br2)- $(l)Silver Ingot$(): Craft Sterling Armor and Silver Bombs. $(br2)- $(l)Salt$(): A basic resource used in various recipes.
$(l)New Mobs$() $(br2)- $(l)Sparkle$(): A small, luminescent creature found in Crystal Canyons. $(br2)- $(l)Spectre$(): A ghostly entity haunting the Lichen Caves.

$(l)Exploring New Biomes$() $(br2)Galosphere introduces biomes rich with resources and unique challenges. Gather your gear and delve into the depths to uncover the mysteries of these new environments!
